column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : Recently Obama and Clinton were down there marching ...
#Text=GT :
#Text=Bullshit !
#Text=It 's all total bullshit .
#Text=The city of Selma -- not to just single it out , the country is racist .
#Text=New York is racist .
#Text=This neighborhood ! I 've lived in this house for fifty years , where you and I are now , and this neighborhood .
#Text=When I first moved in here in 1957 , it did n't have any black neighbors .
#Text=I 'm speaking in 2007 .
#Text=No black neighbors .
#Text=Does that mean Michael Jackson could n't move in ? I guess .
#Text=I do n't see them .
#Text=I guess you could have stars .
#Text=But even they would have trouble .
#Text=And we still have a Harlem .
#Text=We would n't have a Harlem if we had an integrated and assimilated society .
#Text=DS : And that 's going .
#Text=GT :
#Text=If they drive them out ... they 'll go .
#Text=But what I 'm saying is they are sectioned off .
#Text=So we talk about the segregated south , the black ghettos -- the black quarter -- of Birmingham .
#Text=We still have that .
#Text=We are n't so up front about it , meaning they are less honest and more devious in undemocratic ways .

#Text=DS : Did you see the election in Alabama when the Christian Coalition defeated the ballot measure to remove the segregation language from the Alabama Constitution that said nobody is guaranteed a right to an education ?
#Text=GT :
#Text=Such a high level of hypocrisy that has existed in this country from decade to decade .
#Text=I 'm 75 years old , and it was n't so different when I was 25 years old .
#Text=That 's a 50 year difference -- what 's so different ?
#Text=I do n't know .
#Text=I travel and I do n't see much change .
#Text=DS : Have you changed ?
#Text=GT :
#Text=I 've gotten older and maybe more cynical .
#Text=DS : When you were 25 did you look at black people the same way as you look at them now ?
#Text=GT :
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=When I was 25 or 15 , it was the same , because in my town Ocean City , New Jersey , I went to school with black people .
#Text=It was n't segregated .
#Text=I was born in 1932 and when I was in eight or nine I saw the Klan in their white sheets on the Boardwalk .
#Text=This is not Birmingham , this Ocean CIty , New Jersey .
#Text=I saw the Klan .
#Text=My father was a tailor and he was a practicing Catholic .
#Text=A cross was burned across from his story ; I was six or seven .
#Text=And we knew who the Klan were .
#Text=The leading pharmacist was a Klansman , my father told me that .
#Text=Two firemen in the town .
#Text=They would meet publicly , and black people were in the town .
#Text=They had their own Harlem in Ocean City .
#Text=So there is a real estate racism .
#Text=Ocean City , New York City , Selma , Alabama .
#Text=They all have their black quarters still .
